name: Wordpress-crm-lead-capture
tagline: WordPress CRM Lead Capture for VtigerCRM, SugarCRM, SF, Zoho
body:
### WP Leads Builder for Any CRM Pro [Leads Builder for Any CRM Pro](https://www.smackcoders.com/wp-leads-builder-any-crm-pro.html) is a common WordPress plugin that can handle Vtiger, SugarCRM, Zoho CRM and Salesforce to capture or build leads directly from WordPress admin. Now you can generate unlimited forms directly in WordPress admin without any complicated html web forms. Generate web forms via user friendly plugin interface in few simple clicks as short codes. Use the short code which in turn generate as web form in post, page or widget to convert your traffic/visitors as high potential leads to one of your favourite CRM. It supports few third party plugins such as Ninja, Contact form 7 and gravity form plugin. ### Feature highlights * Generate unlimited forms as short codes * Ninja form, contact form 7 and gravity form support added. * Duplicate Handling- Choose to skip or update duplicates. * Advanced Mandatory Field Form Settings. * Assign Captured Lead/Contact To A CRM User. * Manage, edit, update, create and delete short codes. * Email Notification -Option to get success, failure or both. * Google captcha support to avoid spam. * Google Captcha version 2 supported. * Multiple Language support ( English default, French, Dutch, Russian, Italian ). * Capture WordPress User in Lead/Contact module with field mapping option. ### Normal Form Submission [![WP Leads Capture Normal Form](https://www.smackcoders.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/11/NormalFormplay.png)]( https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3DD5nKKxz6A) ### WP Leads Builder for Any CRM Leads Builder For Any CRM is a free version of the plugin that can handle Vtiger, SugarCRM, Zoho CRM and Salesforce to capture or build leads directly from your WordPress site. Now you can generate forms directly in WordPress admin without any complicated html web forms. Generate web forms via user friendly plugin interface in few simple clicks as a short code. Use the short code which in turn used as a form in post, page or widget to convert your traffic/visitors as high potential leads to favourite CRM. Contact form 7 plugin support added in the free version. ### Feature highlights * supports four CRM Vtiger, Sugar, Zoho, Salesforce * Contact form 7 support added. * Can switch to any CRM at any time * Enable Email alerts for each captured data with details * Custom url redirection as specified by post id * Forms can be used as post/page and widget * Can add one email id apart from default admin if enabled. ### Fetch CRM Fields Currently Lead builder pro supports four CRMs. In the setting page you can select and configure the CRM settings. Email All Captured Data fields is enable to get emails for each form feed with details are Success or failure or both. Enable debug option also available. Fetch the lead and contact fields by simply clicking the Fetch lead fields and fetch contact fields buttons. And fetch the CRM users by clicking Fetch CRM users as shown in below figure. ![Upload](https://www.smackcoders.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/11/settings.png) ### Form Builder Form builder page is used to build the form with the list of enabled fields. Click “Generate Lead Shortcode” or “Generate Contact Shortcode” button to create Form Shortcode. User can enter into form builder page by simply click the edit link in any one of the shortcode presents under manage shortcodes. User can select form type (post or widget), error message submission, success message submission and url redirection specified by post id and can enable the google captcha as shown below. ![Upload](https://www.smackcoders.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/11/formBuild.png) Select any one of the bulk action from the drop down. The bulk actions are Enable field, disable field, Update order, enable mandatory, disable mandatory and Save display label. ### Supported Third party plugins Leads Builder PRO supports few third party plugins such as Ninja forms, Contact form 7 and Gravity form which enables to make easy form submission. Use the third party shortcode in the post content for form submission. Install the third party plugins via uploads directory. ![Upload](https://www.smackcoders.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/11/thirdparty.png) ### Ninja Forms Support [![WP Leads Capture Ninja Forms Support](https://www.smackcoders.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/11/NormalFormplay.png)](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=RKO1EnfpjUU) ### Contact Form7 Support [![WP Leads Capture Contact Form 7 Support](https://www.smackcoders.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/11/Contact.png)](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ign-kWyUvZA) ### Gravity Form Support [![WP Leads Capture Gravity Form Support](https://www.smackcoders.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/11/NormalFormplay.png)](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Qxy1jqyLhlw) [Go Pro Now>>](https://www.smackcoders.com/wp-leads-builder-any-crm-pro.html)
Note: Use latest version of the plugins. ### Support or Contact Check out our [documentation](https://www.wordpresscrm.com/documentation/wp-crm-integrations/wordpress-crm-webforms) to know more about the product. For technical support from developers contact [support](https://www.smackcoders.com/support.html) and we’ll help you sort it out.
